articles.title: Lupin season 1, part 2 release date: Romain star shares disappointing update - Express
articles.description: LUPIN has become a hit since dropping on Netflix earlier this month with its first five episodes of season one. However, those itching to binge the second half of the debut series look like they're in for a long wait following an update from star Vincent Lond…
